org.radeox.api.engine

Interface RenderEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRenderEngine, MockInterWikiRenderEngine, MockOldWikiRenderEngine, MockWikiRenderEngine, RWikiBaseRenderEngine, SpecializedRenderEngine

    public interface RenderEngine
    Interface for RenderEngines. A RenderEngine renders a input string to an output string with the help of filters.
    Version:
    $Id: RenderEngine.java 29047 2007-04-18 07:40:45Z ian@caret.cam.ac.uk $
    Author:
    Stephan J. Schmidt

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMacro(Macro macro)
      Add a macro to the render engine, this can be performed from a component or a webapp and will be keyed on its name.
      String getName()
      Name of the RenderEngine.

      Render an input with text markup from a Reader and write the result to a writer

      Render an input with text markup and return a String with e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Name of the RenderEngine. This is used to get a RenderEngine instance with EngineManager.getInstance(name);
        Returns:
        name Name of the engine

      • render

        String render(String content,
            RenderContext context)
        Render an input with text markup and return a String with e.g. HTML
        Parameters:
        content - String with the input to render
        context - Special context for the render engine, e.g. with configuration information
        Returns:
        result Output with rendered content

      • render

        void render(Writer out,
          String content,
          RenderContext context)
            throws IOException
        Render an input with text markup and an write the result e.g. HTML to a writer
        Parameters:
        out - Writer to write the output to
        content - String with the input to render
        context - Special context for the render engine, e.g. with configuration information
        Throws:
        IOException

      • render

        String render(Reader in,
            RenderContext context)
              throws IOException
        Render an input with text markup from a Reader and write the result to a writer
        Parameters:
        in - Reader to read the input from
        context - Special context for the render engine, e.g. with configuration information
        Throws:
        IOException

      • addMacro

        void addMacro(Macro macro)
        Add a macro to the render engine, this can be performed from a component or a webapp and will be keyed on its name. If the webapp is reloaded, the macro will be replaced. When a webapp is unloaded it will be removed from the engine.
        Parameters:
        macro -
